ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] JRE and Heretrix (noob alert)
ygData.msgSnippet: I think Oracle JRE 6 is still preferred since it is the most heavily tested. I have been using openjdk7 for a while now without trouble though. ~Adam

I think Oracle JRE 6 is still preferred since it is the most heavily tested=
. I have been using openjdk7 for a while now without trouble though.

~Adam=


On Jan 29, 2014, at 11:09 AM, Chris Gray <cpgray@...> wrote:

> =
I'm not particularly confident about installing JRE on a Linux machine 
> f=
or running Heritrix. The 3.0 and 3.1 documents seem to suggest that 
> JRE =
1.6 is needed.
> 
> What JRE is needed for Heritrix 3.2? Is the Oracle JRE =
still preferred?
> 
> 
> 


--Apple-Mail=_D6B20DA7-734E-40A1-82E1-F76D13E22D69
